data.name: Indie Rumble Demo
data.detailed_description:
OVERVIEW

Experience Indie Rumble first hand in our official Indie Rumble alpha demo which features Rhythm Knights and Yolk as fully playable characters! Remember to back us on Kickstarter!
data.about_the_game:
OVERVIEW

Experience Indie Rumble first hand in our official Indie Rumble alpha demo which features Rhythm Knights and Yolk as fully playable characters! Remember to back us on Kickstarter!
data.short_description: Experience Indie Rumble first hand in our official Indie Rumble demo which features Rhythm Knights and Yolk as fully playable characters! Remember to back us on Kickstarter!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, Intel HD 3000, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 10240.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo at 2.2 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 2.2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460, AMD Radeon HD 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
